channel.title: Test on Running on R
channel.description: Recent content in Test on Running on R

item.title: Why a Blog?
item.description: Does it work? Seems like it does. This is my first blog post! I wanted to create my own blog using R programming, R Studio, Git, and Github where I would host my personal site and opinions. These opinions will not be fabricated and will be based off my personal analysis. Why start a blog? I have a huge passion for analyzing financial data, especially those 10-K’s and 10-Q’s!! I do not get excited from fleshing out models on excel all day, but I do get excited from the picture painted using all the tools these filings provide.
